item.description:
3:45 - 5:30pm
4th Annual Vertex Networking and Industry Session
88 Sydney Street
What if every day you could work, dream, share and grow while contributing to the discovery of life-saving medicines? Where everyone not only has a say, but is rewarded for speaking up? Where each day feels more like an experience than a job? Where quality of life is a way of life, and passion is always tangible? We invite college students and recent college grads to discover how Vertex might be the right destination for you. Explore one of the fastest growing biopharmas in Cambridge. We will provide an opportunity for students to network and meet some of our scientists and learn how they can apply their degrees to our industry.
More details...
Cost: Free
item.name: 4th Annual Vertex Networking and Industry Session
